title: I didn't receive any rewards for the new season.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
As everyone knows the season over and everyone got his Division rewards. I am Silver 3 and I didn't receive any rewards such as the one everyone who is Silver must get. They are:
Silver Summoner Icon 
Silver Profile Insignia
Silver Loading Screen Border 
Victorious Ward Skin (2x Queues)
I just want to know why this happened to me since I don't have this account banned or anything that is against the rules.
Help me out please, all my friends that I have in the friend list of the name, already received their rewards for the new season. I want to add that the new patch updated on my league and everything from the patch is here, only my season rewards are missing. The region I play in is EU West
Thanks in advance.
Check this: https://imgur.com/a/NfzuX

replies.body: Don't worry about it just yet! Those rewards will be going out over the month, if you're still concerned about it and haven't seen them after a while go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

On that exact same article your question is answered....

"All rewards arrive within one month of the end of season (some rewards may appear faster than others, so don’t worry if you don’t get them all at once)."
